Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
The moment Fafurion woke up, Parme realized that Beleth had deceived her.
She did everything to appease Fafurion's anger, but Fafurion didn't forgive her for neglecting her duty.
Before she died, she told me how her kin had obtained the ability to calm Fafurion.
I'm an Eva's Knight, though. I can't take over a priestess's job. I have to find a warrior who can succeed her.
